--- Page 1 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
In accordance with IMTAR – 21, Subpart C1, 21.C1.18, Subpart C2, 21.C2.9 & Subpart C3, 21.C3.1.20.
Part - I (Reference): Incident /Accident/ Snag / Explosive
a) Defect Report (DR) No: DR/2024/0274 b) Date of Occurrence: 19/10/2023
c) Installation Details: Stormbird Attack - AC-3179-116 at
Base Alpha
Part - II: (Details of Defective Component)
a) Trade: Propulsion b) Date Component 23/10/2023
Received:
c) System/Sub System: Turbine Assembly d) Main Assembly: Station-4 Starboard
e) Nomenclature: Turbine Assembly Assembly Unit f) MOD Status: MOD-D
g) Part No.: PR-3324-T9 h) Sl No.: SN-6222-185
i) Firmware Version: Not Applicable j) Software Version: Not Applicable
k) Date of Installation: 24/06/2023 l) Date of Removal: 22/10/2023
Pg No: 133 Ln No: 24 Pg No: 15 Ln No: 18
m) Manufacturing Agency: Beta Flight Solutions n) Date, Month & Year February 2019
of Manufacturing:
o) Whether under warranty: Yes p) Whether under AMC Yes
/ Repair Contract:
q) Life completed since New: 1653 Hrs / 1571 Cycles

--- Page 2 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Safety Critical
b) Defect Observed: Starter generator malfunction. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Turbine Assembly component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage
d) Attributable Code: NFF - No Failure Found
Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
Date: 01/11/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

--- Page 3 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part VI: Remarks by Quality Dept.
Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit.
Date: 04/11/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy
Part VII: Remarks by User(Project):(if applicable)
Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection.
Date: 04/11/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta
Part VIII: Remarks by ORDAQA (Quality Aspects)
Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions.
Date: 04/11/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair
Part IX: Remarks by CEMILAC / RCMA (Design Aspects)
Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable.
Date: 11/11/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh
Edition Number: 1.0 Form Version Number: 1.0 Date: January 2021
